subject: Basketball
College Athletics
Basketball (College)
lead_paragraph: Marcus Denmon hit three 3-pointers in the final 2 minutes 5 seconds, the last for the go-ahead points, as the No. 4 Tigers fought off No. 8 Kansas, 74-71.
snippet: Marcus Denmon hit three 3-pointers in the final 2 minutes 5 seconds, the last for the go-ahead points, as the No. 4 Tigers fought off No. 8 Kansas, 74-71.
